summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4011 for the improvement of Etruria Street and West Etruria Street, from Nickerson Street to 3rd Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48664, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
